# This document contains updates to Tyndale's TTESV for the changes between ESV 2011 and 2016.
# See https://www.esv.org/about/2016-updates/
# TODO: verify and merge upstream
#
# Note, Numbers 14:42 (change from Lord to LORD) is already upstream.
# Also, the following 2016 changes do not affect word indexing and are possibly english-only changes:
# 2 Samuel 23:34
# 1 Kings 8:48
# 2 Chronicles 6:38
# 2 Chronicles 13:9
# Psalm 18:48
# Ezekiel 40:14
# Hosea 13:14
# Luke 24:50
# Ephesians 3:1
# James 2:10
#
# $START

$Gen 3:16	03=<00802>	05=<00559>	08=<07235>	09=<07235>	11=<06093>	13=<02032>	15=<06089>	18+19=<03205>	20=<01121>	22=<08669>	28=<00376>	32+33=<04910>
